components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,UNKNOWN OR OTHER
summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE LOST POWER.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE SENSOR NEEDED TO BE  REPLACED.  TS  THERE WAS AN ODOR IN THE VEHICLE, THE CLUTCH HAD GONE OUT, THE REAR BRAKES SQUEAKED, AND WATER LEAKED INTO THE INTERIOR ON THE VEHICLE ON THE PASSENGER SIDE.  THE CONSUMER FELT THAT THE DEALER SOLD HER AN UNSAFE VEHICLE.  SCC
